original_question: In a food chain, only about 10 percent of what passes to the next level?

pred_ans_conf_MCQ: In a food chain, only about 10-20% of the energy or biomass at one level is transferred to the next level. This is because most of the energy is lost at each level due to predation, decomposition, and other factors
